text: John Willard Vogt (December 28, 1936 â€“ March 21, 2018) was an American engineer and politician. He was born in Lake Wales, Florida. He studied at the University of Florida. He served in the Florida Senate from 1972 to 1988. Vogt was a member of the Democratic Party. Vogt died on March 21, 2018 at the age of 81 from pulmonary fibrosis in Tallahassee, Florida.Former Senate President John Vogt dies after illness ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:American engineers Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Scientists from Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John W. Vogt
